$ ick run
-> show_ick_vars on python1/: NEEDS_WORK
     ICK_REPO_PATH=/CWD
-> show_ick_vars on mono/java/: NEEDS_WORK
     ICK_REPO_PATH=/CWD
$ ick run --apply
-> show_ick_vars on python1/: NEEDS_WORK
     ICK_APPLY=1
     ICK_REPO_PATH=/CWD
-> show_ick_vars on mono/java/: NEEDS_WORK
     ICK_APPLY=1
     ICK_REPO_PATH=/CWD
